AI Description: HiC-Pro is a bioinformatics pipeline for processing, analyzing, and visualizing high-throughput chromatin conformation capture (Hi-C) data. It allows users to generate significant biological insights by studying chromatin structure, genome organization, and 3D chromatin interactions.
Core Features: Preprocessing Raw Hi-C Data, Mapping Reads To The Reference Genome, Filtering & Processing Valid Interaction Pairs, Normalization & Visualization Of Interactions, Quality Control Assessment Of Hi-C Data, Identifying Topological Domains & Chromatin Interactions
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Genomics, Chromatin Structure, Hi-C Data, Data Visualization, Chromatin Interactions
